name: Unearthly Contagion
description:
You play as an alien who came to earth in order to find a highly dangerous alien from your planet who has escaped from prison. You must find the target, eliminate them and escape without dying. You can possess Humans and use them to your advantage yo enter and exit restricted areas as well as to attack and defend from hostile targets.

Game made by

Andreas Stylianou, Joshua Agulto, Ivaylov Tutekov
